entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @NYGovCuomo Considering how many infected COVID-19 patients he forced to nursing homes that they said they could not handle early. This caused so many deaths and new infections both in patients and in the nursing community. The whole country is shocked by what they have witnessed. https://t.co/7TKUofjkJ9
